<a href="https://appium.io/"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Appium-8831c6?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></a>

[x] Using Appium boilerplate; [ref](https://github.com/webdriverio/appium-boilerplate) <br/>
[x] Using Webdriver CLI; [ref](https://webdriver.io/docs/gettingstarted) <br/>
[x] Structure considering a test for multiple platforms; <br/>
[x] Page objects pattern; [ref](https://webdriver.io/docs/pageobjects) <br/>
[x] Allure reporter; [ref](https://webdriver.io/docs/allure-reporter/) <br/>
[x] Prettier formatter; [ref](https://prettier.io) 

# Requirements
1. Install [`nvm`](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm#installing-and-updating)
2. Install `node` with `nvm`
```
$ nvm install 18.17.1
$ nvm alias default 18.17.1
# or
$ nvm use
```
3. Install and configure emulators for `Android` and `iOS`, use Android Studio and Xcode
4. Install Java, use [`sdkman`](https://sdkman.io/)
5. Update the device name in the [configuration files](./configs)

# Run
```
$ npm run android.app
```
Check in the [`package.json`](./package.json) for another commands.
